title: John Lee Hooker & The Nighthawks - Night of the Hook (1986)
description:
Nice album with unclear liner notes - obviously it's the recording of a live performance - according to the liner notes on April 30, 1986, in Manchester, WY, USA. Unfortunately you can't find 'Manchester, WY' neither on googlemaps nor on wikipedia. According to other sources it could be 'Manchester, NY'. So it's just to hope, that the notes about the personell are true:

John Lee Hooker - guitar, vocals
Mark Wenner - vocals, harmonica
Jim Thackery - vocals, guitar
Jan Zukowsky - vocals, bass
Pete Ragusa - drums
Robert Cray - guitar
Elvin Bishop - guitar
Luther Allison - guitar
John Hammond

probably some more guest musicians according to the announcements on the recording

1- Introducing The Blues

2- House Rent Boogie

3- Boom, Boom, Boom

4- Boogie With The Hook

5- Got My Mojo Working

6- Bring It On Home

7- Bring It On Home

8- Back To The City

9- Black Night

10- Back Seat Boogie

11- Yeah Man

12- Sweet Home Chicago

13- Pretty Thing

Tracks 1-6 :With Robert Cray

Tracks 12-13 :With John Hammond

Nice album with unclear liner notes - obviously it's the recording of a live performance - according to the notes on April 30, 1986, in Manchester, WY, USA. Unfortunately you can't find 'Manchester, WY' neither on googlemaps nor on wikipedia. According to other sources it could be 'Manchester, NY'. So it's just to hope, that the notes about the personell are true:

John Lee Hooker - guitar, vocals
Mark Wenner - vocals, harmonica
Jim Thackery - vocals, guitar
Jan Zukowsky - vocals, bass
Pete Ragusa - drums
Robert Cray - guitar
Elvin Bishop - guitar
Luther Allison - guitar
John Hammond

probably some more guest musicians according to the announcements on the recording and other sources: Muddy Waters, Willie Dixon, J.M. Robinson, J. Cole
